videos.description: Dylan Ennis finds Casey Benson on the outlet pass for a 3-pointer in the first half.
videos.headline: Benson buries a 3-pointer for Oregon

videos.description: Chris Boucher throws down a nice two-handed jam on the break to give Oregon a six-point lead over Cal in the first half.
videos.headline: Boucher's two-handed jam fires up Ducks

videos.description: Tyler Dorsey finds Casey Benson for his 4th 3-pointer of the half
videos.headline: Casey Benson buries the catch and shoot 3-pointer

videos.description: Jordan Bell grabs the offensive rebound and finds Roman Sorkin for three
videos.headline: Jordan Bell grabs the offensive rebound and finds Roman Sorkin for three

videos.description: Oregon's Chris Boucher shows why he's the nation's leading shot blocker with a powerful swat on Cal's Grant Mullins.
videos.headline: Oregon's Boucher punches block into the stands in win

videos.description: Jordan Bell makes the tough layup and draws a foul in the second half against Cal.
videos.headline: Oregon's Bell hits tough layup and-1

videos.description: Dillon Brooks exits game with an unclear injury, did not return for 2nd half
videos.headline: Dillon Brooks exits game with an unclear injury, did not return for 2nd half

videos.description: Tyler Dorsey sends a great pass to Jordan Bell who attacks the rim with a beautiful two-handed slam in the second half over Cal.
videos.headline: Dorsey's beautiful pass sets up Bell for the slam

videos.description: Jordan Bell steals the pass and finishes with a soft touch on the other end
videos.headline: Jordan Bell steals the pass and finishes with a soft touch on the other end

videos.description: Casey Benson sends a nice dish to Jordan Bell for the jam, scoring a career-high 24 points.
videos.headline: Bell flushes it home for career-high 24 points

videos.description: A career high 26-points from Jordan Bell lead the Ducks to a big win over Cal
videos.headline: Jordan Bell's 26 points power the Ducks past the Bears

videos.description: Dillon Brooks leaves Thursday's game in  the first half after colliding with a teammate and suffering a lower left leg injury in No. 11 Oregon's 86-63 win over Cal.
videos.headline: Brooks leaves early as Oregon cruises past Cal
